SEGA‚Äôs futuristic sports classic is reimagined for VR!
C-Smash VRS fuses low-gravity racket action with block-breaking challenges and incredible style in a cosmic setting.

# A Revolutionary VR Experience Created By Veterans
Imagine feeling stimulated and relaxed, your mind and full-body avatar at one with the best music and visuals. A transportive experience is delivered to you by a dream team of VR pioneers to top artists, graphic designers, and musicians committed to changing how a game can make you move, see, hear, and feel.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974745_404718702557441_671116924380733867_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D6oKQjTvCt4Q7kNvgHT3kId&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAFV3veoh6DnDc4wSy9fTHDXGr6fEmRaHESoqEK_sH4Ug&oe=66950F38)

# Challenge Other Players To The Rhythm Of Music
Journey to the edge of space and time or play a variety of competitive modes against players online. Build up a sweat in the Infinity mode, alone or with a friend. 
Become one with dynamic music, living environments, and ultra fluid gameplay - everything and everyone pulsing to the beat. Original tracks from DJ Ken Ishii (Rez Infinite), Danalogue (The Comet is Coming), and UNKLE achieve pure synesthesia during your game sessions!

{1616892119152623}

# A Physical Game For Everyone - Designed To Take The Work Out of the Workout
Intuitive controls allow you to learn the basics in minutes before mastering Power Smashes and other special techniques. Innovative Accessibility options make this a game for everyone: standing, seated, one- or two-, left or right-handed.

changelog.change_log:
New Features:

- Time Attack Mode: Smash the most blocks within the time limit and take your place in the monthly leaderboard.
- Leaderboard Enhancement: Now easily view the top 10 entries and filter to see your own position by selecting any leaderboard.
- Feature Shortcut: Access new features and find online matches quickly with the new button on the main menu.

Gameplay Improvements:

- Practice Mode: Hone your skills with the endless practice mode, accessible from the single-player menu.
- Teleport Movement Update: The teleport movement setting will now predict the ball‚Äôs trajectory and will move you into an optimal position for a clean hit.
- Pause Time Setting (Single Player): Never miss the action with the new pause time setting for teleport movement, ensuring seamless repositioning in single-player modes.
- Reduced Movement Option (Single Player): A new reduced movement setting, applying a higher "pull" strength to the ball for those who prefer a stationary play-style.

Bug Fixes and Quality of Life Updates:

- Various minor bugs resolved.
- Quality of life improvements.
